Name: Death Blessing VI
Desc:
Casts Death Blessing on the enemies exposed to Malice. If you grant blessing on the enemies hit by the Realm of Death generated from certain attack skills or Thanatos's Descent among Revelation Skills and attack enemies with Execution Skills, it fulfills Blessing and destroys enemies from inside. Also enhances Death Blessing and Execution Skills temporarily and resets Shadow Step's cooldown.
Death Blessing deals damage to enemies in the Damage Ignore/Reflection status and [Revelation/Execution] Sneaky Sniping does not take the effects of Contribution.
Also, permanently increases Death Blessing Damage during Malicious Domain by Annihilation.
Required Skill: Lv. 10 Advanced Death Blessing or above

HFields.h1:
Restores 5% of Max HP when defeating 50 enemies.
Restores 3% of Max HP when fulfilling Death Blessing on Boss monsters.
Lasts for up to 90 sec. and stacks up to 15 times.
Realization of Blessing: Obtains the Contribution buff after consuming Death Blessing and attacking enemies at 630% Damage 10 times.
Contribution Buff: For 5 sec., Death Blessing/Execution skill Final Damage +28% and creates 12 Malice on hitting an Execution skill that can fulfill the Blessing.
[Passive Effects: Death Blessing Damage +250%p during Malicious Domain by Annihilation]
